----
resp = client.security.put_privileges(
    privileges={
        "myapp": {
            "read": {
                "actions": [
                    "data:read/*",
                    "action:login"
                ],
                "metadata": {
                    "description": "Read access to myapp"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
